page.title: 16Ascroft's Mill in Merebrow.
page.content: The cornmill was founded by Thomas Ascroft in early 1900. The shop also belongs to the firm T.Ascroft and Sons. In the early 1900's there was a staff of 8 people which included Tommy Ascroft the son of the founder. The present staff has been streamlined to 3 full time and 1 part time office staff. The present fulltime staff are grandsons of the founder. They own two wagons. The machinery was installed by Blezards of Preston and consists of 2 grinders, 2 mixers and a crusher. As well as selling and preparing animal feedstuffs they sell all gardening and farming tools, also peatmoss, woodshavings,cement and limestone. Sometimes farmers come and we crush their barley and oats. Most of the deliveries are local but sometimes they go north to Blackpool.
